title: BusinessDecision
description: The record of a technical or business decision capturing the context of the decision.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The project name this decision is associated with to be used for discovery.

RiskAssessmentDocument.title: Risk Assessment Document
RiskAssessmentDocument.description: The document containing the risk assessment.

ApprovalStatusID.title: Approval Status ID
ApprovalStatusID.description: The relationship to the current DecisionApprovalStatus.

DecisionLevelID.title: Decision Level ID
DecisionLevelID.description: The relationship to the current DecisionLevel.

DecisionDueDate.title: Decision Due Date
DecisionDueDate.description: The planned due date for the decision to be taken.

DecisionDate.title: Decision Date
DecisionDate.description: The actual date when the decision was taken.

DecisionSummary.title: Decision Summary
DecisionSummary.description: A text summarizing decision highlights and the reasoning behind the decision.

Contributors.title: Contributors
Contributors.description: Individuals involved in the decision, including those who might not be decision makers or owners. Decision contributors might gather alternatives, data points, and decision criteria that are ultimately used by decision makers.

DecisionOwners.title: DecisionOwners
DecisionOwners.description: Individuals who are responsible for taking action based on the decision that was made and defending the option chosen, or reviewing it in the future if change is needed.

DecisionMakers.title: Decision Makers
DecisionMakers.description: Individuals who decide on one option upon which to take action, usually by comparison with other option alternatives. Decision makers are usually responsible for the decision date and weighing decision alternatives.

AppropriateFrame.title: Appropriate Frame
AppropriateFrame.description: Context about the decision quality 'appropriate frame' element.

DoableAlternatives.title: Doable Alternatives
DoableAlternatives.description: Context about the decision quality 'creative, doable alternatives' elements.

SequenceNumber.title: Sequence Number
SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number as key into the array of  DoableAlternatives. The sequence number stays invariant in the life of the record. The SequenceNumber is mandatory.

Triggers.title: Triggers
Triggers.description: The optional list of ActivityTemplates to trigger activities if the DoableAlternatives element is selected.

items.title: OneAlternative
items.description: A condition, which causes a re-evaluation of the decision and optionally the re-execution of a workflow.

InformationReliability.title: Information Reliability
InformationReliability.description: Context about the decision quality 'meaningful, reliable information' element.

TradeOffAnalysis.title: Trade-Off Analysis
TradeOffAnalysis.description: Context about the decision quality 'clear values and trade-off' element.

ReasoningCorrectness.title: Reasoning Correctness
ReasoningCorrectness.description: Context about the decision quality 'logically correct reasoning' element.

CommitmentToAction.title: Commitment to Action
CommitmentToAction.description: Context about the decision quality 'commitment to action' element.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: An array of free remarks or annotations.

Triggers.title: Triggers
Triggers.description: Any events, that may cause a re-evaluation of the decision.

SelectedAlternativeSequenceNumber.title: Selected Alternative Sequence Number
SelectedAlternativeSequenceNumber.description: If multiple DecisionQualities.DoableAlternatives[] are recorded, this property holds the SequenceNumber decided as the selected alternative.

PriorActivityIDs.title: Prior Activity IDs
PriorActivityIDs.description: The relationships to potential multiple preceding activity or projects.
